## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                 | Type                   | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | --------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |

| `startOpen` | `start-open` | Should it initially be open | `boolean \| undefined` | `undefined` |
